Nothing you don't.

Built for modern businesses that want to focus on growth, not payment complexity.

Accept Everything

Cards, crypto (BTC, ETH, USDC), digital wallets, and bank transfers. Your customers pay how they want.

  • 50+ payment methods
  • Auto currency conversion
  • Instant settlements

All-in-One Platform

Payments, bookings, subscriptions, and analytics. Stop juggling multiple tools and platforms.

  • Unified dashboard
  • Booking calendar
  • Subscription billing

Enterprise Security

Bank-level security with fraud protection, PCI compliance, and 99.9% uptime guaranteed.

  • PCI DSS Level 1
  • Real-time fraud detection
  • SOC 2 compliant

Built-in crypto support

Ready to accept Bitcoin, Ethereum, stablecoins, and major cryptocurrencies with automatic conversion.

Transakt vs Stripe, PayPal, Whop

Why teams choose Transakt for modern checkout and crypto support.

FeatureTransaktStripePayPalWhop
Checkout conversionOptimized UX, scroll/hover polishGreat, dev-centricFamiliar, but dated flowEcom/membership focused
Payment methodsCards, crypto, walletsCards, walletsPayPal, cardsCards, wallets
Crypto supportBuilt-inLimited/third-partyLimited regionsThird-party
Pricing transparencySimple, no hidden feesTiered + add-onsVaries by countryPlatform fees
Developer experienceModern API + fast startExcellent SDKs/docsOKProduct-led

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about Transakt.

Does Transakt support crypto payments?⌄
Yes. Bitcoin, Ethereum, and stablecoins with automatic conversion.
How long does setup take?⌄
Most teams get a working checkout in under 5 minutes.
Is there a free trial?⌄
Early access users get a 25% lifetime discount and trial access.
How does pricing compare to Stripe and PayPal?⌄
Transparent pricing with no hidden fees. See the pricing section for details.
